snippet: The company, which announced a management shake-up this week, said it expected flat sales in the fourth quarter, sending its shares plunging.
abstract: Yoga apparel maker Lululemon Athletica announces third-quarter earnings, lowering its yearly forecast and saying it expects same-store sales to be flat in fourth quarter; reports profit of $66.1 million, or 45 cents per share, up from $57 million on year earlier; revenue increased 20 percent in third-quarter, up to $379.9 million.
lead_paragraph: The company, which announced a management shake-up this week, said it expected flat sales in the fourth quarter, sending its shares plunging.

headline.main: Lululemon Posts a Profit, but Lowers Yearly Forecast
headline.print_headline: Lululemon Posts a Profit, But Lowers Yearly Forecast
